trans-unit.target: TEXT_JOBREL500QUESTLEAVE_00373_ARDASHIR_000_000<tab>Oh, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! I was not expecting you to return so soon. Is...is something wrong?
TEXT_JOBREL500QUESTLEAVE_00373_Q1_000_000<tab>Tell him you wish to abandon your work on the anima?
TEXT_JOBREL500QUESTLEAVE_00373_ARDASHIR_000_010<tab>Of course, how silly of me! Though, for a moment, I was all but certain you wished to...to...
TEXT_JOBREL500QUESTLEAVE_00373_ARDASHIR_000_011<tab>Ahem. But should the time come that you decide you can no longer continue, I would understand.

TEXT_JOBREL500QUESTLEAVE_00373_ARDASHIR_000_020<tab>You need say no more. Far be it from me to deny you a well-earned respite. If and when you are willing to resume our research, I shall be here, ready and waiting.
TEXT_JOBREL500QUESTLEAVE_00373_ARDASHIR_000_030<tab>Very well, then I shall take the anima glass for safekeeping.
TEXT_JOBREL500QUESTLEAVE_00373_ARDASHIR_000_031<tab>If and when you are willing to resume our research, I shall be here, ready and waiting.
TEXT_JOBREL500QUESTLEAVE_00373_SYSTEM_000_001<tab>Should you choose to abandon the quest “Born Again Anima,” the aetheric condensation of your anima weapon will be reset.
TEXT_JOBREL500QUESTLEAVE_00373_SYSTEM_000_002<tab>Moreover, your progress will not be restored in the event you decide to undertake this quest again with the same job.
TEXT_JOBREL500QUESTLEAVE_00373_SYSTEM_000_003<tab>Please be advised that this process cannot be reversed.
TEXT_JOBREL500QUESTLEAVE_00373_Q1_000_010<tab>Are you certain you wish to abandon the quest “Born Again Anima” and reset your progress?
TEXT_JOBREL500QUESTLEAVE_00373_SYSTEM_000_010<tab>You may speak with Ardashir at any time should you decide to abandon this quest in the future.
TEXT_JOBREL500QUESTLEAVE_00373_SYSTEM_000_020<tab>You may speak with Ardashir at any time should you decide to undertake this quest in the future.
